## Other Related Groups

The following are other related Berkeley organizations, in which many of our faculty participate

* [Bakar Institute of Digital Materials for the Planet (BIDMaP)](https://bidmap.berkeley.edu/)
* [Berkeley Artificial Intelligence Research (BAIR)](https://bair.berkeley.edu/)
* [Berkeley Institute for Data Science (BIDS)](https://bids.berkeley.edu/)
* [Center for Computational Biology (CCB)](https://ccb.berkeley.edu/)
* [Center for the Theoretical Foundations of Learning, Inference, Information, Intelligence, Mathematics and Microeconomics at Berkeley (CLIMB)](https://climb.berkeley.edu/)
* [Computational Precision Health](https://computationalhealth.berkeley.edu/)
* [Schmidt Center for Data Science and Environment (DSE)](https://dse.berkeley.edu/)
